# standalone

## url schema

### Init
  * `https://miruku.li/#[tag]`
    * [demo input](https://miruku.li/#input)
  * `https://miruku.li/#[url]`
    * [demo dummy](https://miruku.li/#/null/dummy.js)
    * [demo with dataurl](https://miruku.li/#data:text/javascript;charset=utf-8;base64,)
### Running
  * `https://miruku.li/#0=[lz-encoded-data]`
     * [demo hello world](https://miruku.li/#0=N4IgLiBcIJYHYAcCuEA0IBuUQAsCmANgQPYAEA7sQE4EAmIAvkA)
